name: MSCRMGetOnlineInstanceByName
friendlyName: MSCRM Get Online Instance By Name
description: Gets an Online instance ID based on the name of the instance.
author: Wael Hamze
instanceNameFormat: MSCRM Get Online Instance By Name

inputs.name: apiUrl
inputs.label: ApiUrl
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the Service Url as per documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api

inputs.name: instanceName
inputs.label: InstanceName
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name used in the Dynamics 365 domain: https://[instancename].crm[n].dynamics.com

inputs.name: vstsInstanceIdOutputVariableName
inputs.label: VstsInstanceIdOutputVariableName
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the VSTS variable you want populated with the instance id that is returned.  Do not use $(variableName).  Instead just use variableName.
